title: Ava Is a Vegan
description: Have you ever thought about how other people may not eat the same foods as you? All people eat different food according to their lifestyle and beliefs. In Ava Is a Vegan, students will learn what a vegan like Ava does and does not eat. This story supports emergent readers by providing colorful illustrations and high-frequency words. Students will also have the opportunity to practice connecting to their prior knowledge to better understand the story as well as comparing and contrasting details from the text.
meta: dairy, grains, ground, oatmeal, tofu, vegan
